content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment in Munich to be a great place to live. Let's get down to business and discuss the rent. What is your budget?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, Mister Schmidt, I am a student and I am on a tight budget. I would like to pay 600 Euros per month for the apartment.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, Maryam, but 600 Euros is much lower than my asking price. I'm looking for a rent that reflects the value of the apartment and its prime location in the city center. Can you offer more?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that the location is great, but I am not in a position to pay a lot of money. How about 650 Euros per month?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: 650 Euros is still below my expectations. I need a rent that covers my expenses and allows me to make a reasonable profit. Can you go higher?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I can offer 700 Euros per month. I think this is a fair price for a student like me.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Maryam, 700 Euros is closer to what I'm looking for, but it's still not enough. I'm sure you understand that I need to get a fair market value for my property. Can you increase your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 750 Euros per month!
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but 750 Euros is still not enough for me to consider renting out the apartment to you. I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking for a higher rent. If you cannot increase your offer, I'll have to reconsider my options.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I have already offered a fair price for a student like me.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand your position, Maryam. If you feel that 750 Euros is your maximum offer, then I respect your decision. We will not continue the negotiation. Thank you for your time. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
